About Buffalo Wild Wings Buffalo Wild Wings is a Fast Food restaurant located at 23 W Union St in Athens, OH . Buffalo Wild Wings has been described as an Good Fast Food restaurant and has received an average rating of 5 by our members. Quick Facts
Cuisine: Fast Food, Cajun, BBQ Accepts Credit Card: Yes Parking: N/A
Atmosphere: N/A Take Reservations: Yes Serves Alcohol: N/A Smoking Allowed: No

Comments
Buffalo Wild Wings Tips We were told 20 minutes before they closed that they wouldn't seat us, and they couldn't guarantee that they could get us wings to go before they closed, either. Fast food restaurants are better.
Michelle R. Terrible service. Second time I've come and they completely screw up my order. Listen to your customers and stop running your mouth...
Morgan S. Service has not stepped up for homecoming weekend. Disappointing.
Tony B. Nope...service is still bad.
Chris L. Service may have improved since other comments. A bit slow but nothing unexpected of a bdubs. Tuesday and Thursday deals. Some booths have their own tvs which seems oddly antisocial.
Alex D.
